INNER JOIN interrogation_record ON interrogation_record.id = case1.interrogation_record_id INNER JOIN patient ON patient.id = interrogation_record.patient_id INNER JOIN doctor ON doctor.id = interrogation_record.doctor_id
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(case1.id) FROM case1
AND doctor.id=#{parameters.doctorId}
